metadata.Title: CVE-2014-125018 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found in FFmpeg 2.0. Affected by this issue is the function decode_slice_header. The manipulation leads to memory corruption. The attack may be launched remotely. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
